issue.title: [R] Expose global thread pool optins
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will permit users to configure multithreading options e.g. for conversions.  See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/lib.pyx#L40 in Python
